name: fan-club-z
description: Root workspace package for Fan Club Z

scripts.build: npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server run build
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix client run typecheck && npm --prefix server run typecheck
scripts.lint: npm --prefix client run lint && npm --prefix server run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix client run lint:fix && npm --prefix server run lint:fix
scripts.test:smoke: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
